statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating > 3 AND timestamp <= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback_table WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 week';
DELETE FROM product_recommendations WHERE product_id = 5 AND recommendation_score < 5;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500;
DELETE FROM product_recommendations WHERE product_id = 200 AND recommendation_score > 4.5;
DELETE FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 100 AND customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommended_for_customer_id = 200 AND recommendation_type = 'Discount';
